author: E1

persona.mission: Create a civic platform that feels human, urgent, and trustworthy. No generic government gray-ware.
principles: Clarity is Kindness: For non-tech savvy users, bigger is better.
Status is Signal: Color is not decoration; it is information (Red = Danger, Green = Safe).
Native Feel: It must feel like a native app even on the web.

layout_system.container: w-full max-w-md mx-auto px-4 pb-20 pt-4
layout_system.card_style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] overflow-hidden

AQI_Widget.description: The heartbeat of the app. Must be instantly readable.
AQI_Widget.structure: flex flex-col p-5 bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm relative overflow-hidden

fixes.badge_container: inline-flex px-3 py-1 rounded-full items-center justify-center min-w-[80px] text-center
fixes.badge_text: text-xs font-bold whitespace-normal leading-tight break-words text-center

Quick_Actions.item_style: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-xl transition-all active:scale-95 border border-transparent hover:border-gray-200

Dump_Yard_Card.structure: flex flex-col p-4 bg-orange-50/50 border border-orange-100 rounded-2xl

Header.structure: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full bg-gray-900 text-white shadow-md backdrop-blur-sm bg-opacity-95

aqi_badge_wrap.problem: Long status text like 'Very Unhealthy' breaks layout
aqi_badge_wrap.solution_css: max-w-full whitespace-normal text-center leading-3 py-1.5 h-auto min-h-[24px]
aqi_badge_wrap.recommendation: Do not use fixed height pills. Allow them to grow vertically.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. APPLY THE FIXES: Go to `Dashboard.js` or `AQIWidget.js` component and apply the specific badge fixes.
2. STANDARDIZE CARDS: Replace all custom card styles with the `card_style` defined in layout_system.
3. HEADER UPDATE: Ensure the header is `bg-gray-900` and sticky.
4. FONT CHECK: Ensure `Noto Sans Telugu` is loaded and applied for Telugu text.
5. TEST ID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Buttons must be at least 44px height for touch targets.
Use 2px borders for active states to improve accessibility.
